title: Aboutype
content:
Aboutype, Inc. is a Massachusetts design studio and foundry run by [Joffre Lefevre](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000349/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joffre%20Lefevre).

**URL:** [http://www.aboutype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000349/http:/www.aboutype.com/ "http://www.aboutype.com")

**Fonts**

 [Bitters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000349/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitters)
